activities: Information will be used to prepare pre-employment background reports and due diligence background checks for individuals being considered for employment, promotion, reassignment or retention as an employee within the company.  GSI shall maintain the Confidential Information in strict confidence.
eucountries: France, Italy, Malta, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: GSI shall use any information provided in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations, including but not limited to, the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act, the Fair Credit Reporting Act, the Drivers Privacy Protection Act and Right to Financial Privacy Act with respect to any pre-employment screening services.  We will cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for dispute resolution.
